original: Majjhima Nikāya 139
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Araṇavibhaṅgasutta
analyzed: araṇa vibhaṅga sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “araṇavibhaṅgaṁ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi.
analyzed: araṇa vibhaṅgam vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi

original: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Na kāmasukhamanuyuñjeyya hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, na ca attakilamathānuyogamanuyuñjeyya dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ.
analyzed: na kāma sukham anuyuñjeyya hīnam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anattha sahita na ca atta kilamatha anuyogam anuyuñjeyya dukkham anariyam anattha sahita

original: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ete kho bhikkhave ubho ante an upagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhu karaṇī ñāṇa karaṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Ussādanañca jaññā, apasādanañca jaññā;
analyzed: ussādanañca jaññā apasādanañca jaññā

original: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā nevussādeyya, na apasādeyya, dhammameva deseyya.
analyzed: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā na iva ussādeyya na apasādeyya dhammam eva deseyya

original: Sukhavinicchayaṁ jaññā;
analyzed: sukha vinicchayam jaññā

original: sukhavinicchayaṁ ñatvā ajjhattaṁ sukhamanuyuñjeyya.
analyzed: sukha vinicchayam ñatvā ajjhattam sukham anuyuñjeyya

original: Rahovādaṁ na bhāseyya, sammukhā na khīṇaṁ bhaṇe.
analyzed: rahovādam na bhāseyya sammukhā na khīṇam bhaṇe

original: Ataramānova bhāseyya, no taramāno.
analyzed: a taramānaḥ iva bhāseyya na u taramānaḥ

original: Janapadaniruttiṁ nābhiniveseyya, samaññaṁ nātidhāveyyāti—
analyzed: janapada niruttim na abhiniveseyya samaññam na atidhāveyya ati

original: ayamuddeso araṇavibhaṅgassa.
analyzed: ayam uddesaḥ araṇa vibhaṅgassa

original: ‘Na kāmasukhamanuyuñjeyya hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, na ca attakilamathānuyogamanuyuñjeyya dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitan’ti—
analyzed: na kāma sukham anuyuñjeyya hīnam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anattha sahita na ca atta kilamatha anuyogam anuyuñjeyya dukkham anariyam anattha sahitanti

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ; Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Yo kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho; micchāpaṭipadā.
analyzed: yaḥ kāma paṭisandhi sukhinaḥ somanassa anuyogaḥ hīnaḥ gammaḥ pothujjanikaḥ anariyaḥ anattha sahitaḥ sa dukkhaḥ eso dhammo sa upaghātaḥ sa upāyāsaḥ sa pariḷāhaḥ micchā paṭipadā

original: Yo kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ ananuyogo hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho; sammāpaṭipadā.
analyzed: yaḥ kāma paṭisandhi sukhinaḥ somanassa anuyogam an anuyogaḥ hīnam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anattha sahita adukkhaḥ esaḥ dhammaḥ an upaghātaḥ an upāyāsaḥ a pariḷāhaḥ sammā paṭipadā

original: Yo attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṁhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho; micchāpaṭipadā.
analyzed: yaḥ atta kilamatha anuyogaḥ dukkhaḥ anariyaḥ anattha sahitaḥ sa dukkhaḥ eso dhammo sa upaghātaḥ sa upāyāsaḥ sa pariḷāhaḥ micchā paṭipadā

original: Yo attakilamathānuyogaṁ ananuyogo dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, adukkho eso dhammo anupaghāto anupāyāso apariḷāho; sammāpaṭipadā.
analyzed: yaḥ atta kilamatha anuyogam an anuyogaḥ dukkham anariyam anattha sahita adukkhaḥ esaḥ dhammaḥ an upaghātaḥ an upāyāsaḥ a pariḷāhaḥ sammā paṭipadā

original: ‘Na kāmasukhamanuyuñjeyya hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, na ca attakilamathānuyogaṁ anuyuñjeyya dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitan’ti—
analyzed: na kāma sukham anuyuñjeyya hīnam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anattha sahita na ca atta kilamatha anuyogam anuyuñjeyya dukkham anariyam anattha sahitanti

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Ete kho ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattatī’ti—
analyzed: ete kho ubho ante an upagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhu karaṇī ñāṇa karaṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati iti

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: ayam eva ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
analyzed: sammā diṭṭhi sammā saṅkappo sammā vācā sammā kammanto sammā ājīvaḥ sammā vāyāmaḥ sammā sati sammā samādhi

original: ‘Ete kho ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattatī’ti—
analyzed: ete kho ubho ante an upagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhu karaṇī ñāṇa karaṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati iti

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vutta idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Ussādanañca jaññā, apasādanañca jaññā;
analyzed: ussādanañca jaññā apasādanañca jaññā

original: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā nevussādeyya, na apasādeyya, dhammameva deseyyā’ti—
analyzed: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā na iva ussādeyya na apasādeyya dhammam eva deseyya ati

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, ussādanā ca hoti apasādanā ca, no ca dhammadesanā?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave ussādanā ca hoti apasādanā ca no ca dhamma desanā

original: ‘Ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ anuyuttā hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
analyzed: ye kāma paṭisandhi sukhino somanassa anuyogam anuyuttāḥ hīnam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anattha sahita sabbe te sa dukkhā sa upaghātā sa upāyāsā sa pariḷāhā micchā paṭipannā ati

original: iti vadaṁ ittheke apasādeti.
analyzed: iti vadam itthā ike apasāda iti

original: ‘Ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ ananuyuttā hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
analyzed: ye kāma paṭisandhi sukhino somanassa anuyogam an anuyuttāḥ hīnam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anattha sahita sabbe te adukkhāḥ an upaghātāḥ an upāyāsāḥ a pariḷāhāḥ sammā paṭipannāḥ ti

original: iti vadaṁ ittheke ussādeti.
analyzed: iti itthā ike ussāda iti

original: ‘Ye attakilamathānuyogaṁ anuyuttā dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
analyzed: ye atta kilamatha anuyogam anuyuttāḥ dukkham anariyam anattha sahita sabbe te sa dukkhā sa upaghātā sa upāyāsā sa pariḷāhā micchā paṭipannā ati

original: iti vadaṁ ittheke apasādeti.
analyzed: iti vadam itthā ike apasāda iti

original: ‘Ye attakilamathānuyogaṁ ananuyuttā dukkhaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
analyzed: ye atta kilamatha anuyogam an anuyuttāḥ dukkham anariyam anattha sahita sabbe te adukkhāḥ an upaghātāḥ an upāyāsāḥ a pariḷāhā sammā paṭipannā ati

original: iti vadaṁ ittheke ussādeti.
analyzed: iti itthā ike ussāda iti

original: ‘Yesaṁ kesañci bhavasaṁyojanaṁ appahīnaṁ, sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
analyzed: yesam kesañci bhava sayojanam sabbe te sa dukkhā sa upaghātā sa upāyāsā sa pariḷāhā micchā paṭipannā ati

original: iti vadaṁ ittheke apasādeti.
analyzed: iti vadam itthā ike apasāda iti

original: ‘Yesaṁ kesañci bhavasaṁyojanaṁ pahīnaṁ, sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
analyzed: yesam kesañci bhava sayojanam sabbe te adukkhāḥ an upaghātāḥ an upāyāsāḥ a pariḷāhāḥ sammā paṭipannāḥ ati

original: iti vadaṁ ittheke ussādeti.
analyzed: iti itthā ike ussāda iti

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ussādanā ca hoti apasādanā ca, no ca dhammadesanā.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave ussādanā ca hoti apasādanā ca no ca dhamma desanā

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, nevussādanā hoti na apasādanā, dhammadesanā ca?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave na iva ussādanā hoti na apasādanā dhamma desanā ca

original: ‘Ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṁ anuyuttā hīnaṁ gammaṁ pothujjanikaṁ anariyaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ, sabbe te sadukkhā saupaghātā saupāyāsā sapariḷāhā micchāpaṭipannā’ti—
analyzed: ye kāma paṭisandhi sukhino somanassa anuyogam anuyuttāḥ hīnam gammam pothujjanikam anariyam anattha sahita sabbe te sa dukkhā sa upaghātā sa upāyāsā sa pariḷāhā micchā paṭipannā ati

original: na evamāha.
analyzed: na evam āha

original: ‘Anuyogo ca kho sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
analyzed: anuyogaḥ ca kho sa dukkhaḥ eso dhammo sa upaghātaḥ sa upāyāsaḥ sa pariḷāho

analyzed: yesam kesañci bhava sayojanam sabbe te sa dukkhā sa upaghātā sa upāyāsā sa pariḷāhā micchā paṭipannā ati

analyzed: na evam āha

analyzed: iti vadam dhammam eva deseti

original: ‘Yesaṁ kesañci bhavasaṁyojanaṁ pahīnaṁ, sabbe te adukkhā anupaghātā anupāyāsā apariḷāhā sammāpaṭipannā’ti—
analyzed: yesam kesañci bhava sayojanam sabbe te adukkhāḥ an upaghātāḥ an upāyāsāḥ a pariḷāhāḥ sammā paṭipannāḥ ati

original: na evamāha.
analyzed: na evam āha

original: ‘Bhavasaṁyojane ca kho pahīne bhavopi pahīno hotī’ti—
analyzed: bhava sayojane ca khalu pahīne bhavaḥ api pahīnaḥ hoti iti

original: iti vadaṁ dhammameva deseti.

analyzed: ussādanañca ñatvā apasādanañca ñatvā na iva ussādeyya na apasādeyya dhammam eva deseyya ati

analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Sukhavinicchayaṁ jaññā;

original: sukhavinicchayaṁ ñatvā ajjhattaṁ sukhamanuyuñjeyyā’ti—

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Pañcime, bhikkhave, kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: pañcime bhikkhave kāma guṇāḥ

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā,
analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: sotaviññeyyā saddā …
analyzed: sota viññeyyā saddā

original: ghānaviññeyyā gandhā …
analyzed: ghāna viññeyyāḥ gandhāḥ

original: jivhāviññeyyā rasā …
analyzed: jivhā viññeyyāḥ rasāḥ

original: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṁhitā rajanīyā—
analyzed: kāya viññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piya rūpā kāma upasahitā rajanīyā

original: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave pañca kāmaguṇā

original: Yaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ idaṁ vuccati kāmasukhaṁ mīḷhasukhaṁ puthujjanasukhaṁ anariyasukhaṁ.
analyzed: yam kho bhikkhave ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukham somanassam idam vuccati kāma sukham mīḍha sukham puthujjana sukham anariya sukha

original: ‘Na āsevitabbaṁ, na bhāvetabbaṁ, na bahulīkātabbaṁ, bhāyitabbaṁ etassa sukhassā’ti—vadāmi.
analyzed: na āsevitabba na bhāvetabba na bahulīkātabba bhāyitabba etassa sukhassa ativadāmi

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati pe tatiyam jhānam pe

original: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Idaṁ vuccati nekkhammasukhaṁ pavivekasukhaṁ upasamasukhaṁ sambodhisukhaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati nekkhamma sukham paviveka sukham upasama sukham sambodhi sukha

original: ‘Āsevitabbaṁ, bhāvetabbaṁ, bahulīkātabbaṁ, na bhāyitabbaṁ etassa sukhassā’ti—vadāmi.
analyzed: āsevitabba bhāvetabba bahulīkātabba na bhāyitabba etassa sukhassa ativadāmi

original: ‘Sukhavinicchayaṁ jaññā;
analyzed: sukha vinicchayam jaññā

original: sukhavinicchayaṁ ñatvā ajjhattaṁ sukhamanuyuñjeyyā’ti—
analyzed: sukha vinicchayam ñatvā ajjhattam sukham anuyuñjeyyāti

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vuttam idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Rahovādaṁ na bhāseyya, sammukhā na khīṇaṁ bhaṇe’ti—
analyzed: rahovādam na bhāseyya sammukhā na khīṇam bhaṇa iti

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta

original: Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yaṁ jaññā rahovādaṁ abhūtaṁ atacchaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ sasakkaṁ taṁ rahovādaṁ na bhāseyya.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yam jaññā rahovādam a bhūtam a taccham anattha sahitam sa sakkam tam rahovādam na bhāseyya

original: Yampi jaññā rahovādaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ tassapi sikkheyya avacanāya.
analyzed: yam pi jaññā rahovādam bhūtam taccham anattha sahitam tassa api sikkheyya a vacanāya

original: Yañca kho jaññā rahovādaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasaṁhitaṁ tatra kālaññū assa tassa rahovādassa vacanāya.
analyzed: yat ca kho jaññā rahovādam bhūtam attha sahitam tatra kālaññū assa tassa rahovādassa vacanāya

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yaṁ jaññā sammukhā khīṇavādaṁ abhūtaṁ atacchaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ sasakkaṁ taṁ sammukhā khīṇavādaṁ na bhāseyya.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yam jaññā sammukhā khīṇa vādam a bhūtam a taccham anattha sahitam sa sakkam tam sammukhā khīṇa vādam na bhāseyya

original: Yampi jaññā sammukhā khīṇavādaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anatthasaṁhitaṁ tassapi sikkheyya avacanāya.
analyzed: yam pi jaññā sammukhā khīṇa vādam bhūtam taccham anattha sahitam tassa api sikkheyya avacanāya

original: Yañca kho jaññā sammukhā khīṇavādaṁ bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasaṁhitaṁ tatra kālaññū assa tassa sammukhā khīṇavādassa vacanāya.
analyzed: yat ca kho jaññā sammukhā khīṇa vādam bhūtam tat śam attha sahitam tatra kālaññū assa tassa sammukhā khīṇa vādassa vacanāya

original: ‘Rahovādaṁ na bhāseyya, sammukhā na khīṇaṁ bhaṇe’ti—
analyzed: rahovādam na bhāseyya sammukhā na khīṇam bhaṇa iti

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vutta idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Ataramānova bhāseyya no taramāno’ti—
analyzed: a taramānā iva bhāseyya na u taramānā uti

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, taramānassa bhāsato kāyopi kilamati, cittampi upahaññati, saropi upahaññati, kaṇṭhopi āturīyati, avisaṭṭhampi hoti aviññeyyaṁ taramānassa bhāsitaṁ.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave taramānassa bhāsato kāyaḥ api kilamati cittam api upahaññati saraḥ api upahaññati kaṇṭhaḥ api āturīyati avisaṭṭham pi hoti aviññeyyam taramānassa bhāsita

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ataramānassa bhāsato kāyopi na kilamati, cittampi na upahaññati, saropi na upahaññati, kaṇṭhopi na āturīyati, visaṭṭhampi hoti viññeyyaṁ ataramānassa bhāsitaṁ.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave a taramānassa bhāsato kāyaḥ api na kilamati cittam api na upahaññati saraḥ api na upahaññati kaṇṭhaḥ api na āturīyati visaṭṭham pi hoti viññeyyam a taramānassa bhāsita

original: ‘Ataramānova bhāseyya, no taramāno’ti—
analyzed: a taramānā iva bhāseyya na u taramānā uti

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vutta idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: ‘Janapadaniruttiṁ nābhiniveseyya, samaññaṁ nātidhāveyyā’ti—
analyzed: janapada niruttim na abhiniveseyya samaññam na atidhāveyya ati

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiyā ca abhiniveso hoti samaññāya ca atisāro?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave janapada niruttiyā ca abhinivesaḥ hoti samaññāya ca atisāro

original: Idha, bhikkhave, tadevekaccesu janapadesu ‘pātī’ti sañjānanti, ‘pattan’ti sañjānanti,
analyzed: idha bhikkhave tat eva ekaccesu janapadesu pāti iti sañjānanti pattanti sañjānanti

original: ‘vittan’ti sañjānanti, ‘sarāvan’ti sañjānanti ‘dhāropan’ti sañjānanti, ‘poṇan’ti
analyzed: vittanti sañjānanti sarāvanti sañjānanti dhāropanti sañjānanti poṇanti

original: sañjānanti, ‘pisīlavan’ti sañjānanti.
analyzed: sañjānanti pisīlavanti sañjānanti

original: Iti yathā yathā naṁ tesu tesu janapadesu sañjānanti tathā tathā thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati:
analyzed: iti yathā yathā nam tesu tesu janapadesu sañjānanti tathā tathā thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati

original: ‘idameva saccaṁ, moghamaññan’ti.
analyzed: idam eva sat ca mogham aññanti

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiyā ca abhiniveso hoti samaññāya ca atisāro.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave janapada niruttiyā ca abhinivesaḥ hoti samaññāya ca atisāro

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiyā ca anabhiniveso hoti samaññāya ca anatisāro?

original: Idha, bhikkhave, tadevekaccesu janapadesu ‘pātī’ti sañjānanti, ‘pattan’ti sañjānanti,
analyzed: idha bhikkhave tat eva ekaccesu janapadesu pāti iti sañjānanti pattanti sañjānanti

original: ‘vittan’ti sañjānanti, ‘sarāvan’ti sañjānanti, ‘dhāropan’ti sañjānanti, ‘poṇan’ti
analyzed: vittanti sañjānanti sarāvanti sañjānanti dhāropanti sañjānanti poṇanti

original: sañjānanti, ‘pisīlavan’ti sañjānanti.
analyzed: sañjānanti pisīlavanti sañjānanti

original: Iti yathā yathā naṁ tesu tesu janapadesu sañjānanti ‘idaṁ kira me āyasmanto sandhāya voharantī’ti tathā tathā voharati aparāmasaṁ.
analyzed: iti yathā yathā nam tesu tesu janapadesu sañjānanti idam kira me āyasmantaḥ sandhāya voharanti iti tathā tathā voharati aparāmasa

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, janapadaniruttiyā ca anabhiniveso hoti, samaññāya ca anatisāro.

original: ‘Janapadaniruttiṁ nābhiniveseyya samaññaṁ nātidhāveyyā’ti—
analyzed: janapada niruttim na abhiniveseyya samaññam na atidhāveyya ati

original: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti yam tam vutta idam etam paṭicca vutta

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, yo kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito, sadukkho eso dhammo saupaghāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho;
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave yaḥ kāma paṭisandhi sukhinaḥ somanassa anuyogaḥ hīnaḥ gammaḥ pothujjanikaḥ anariyaḥ anattha sahitaḥ sa dukkhaḥ eso dhammo sa upaghātaḥ sa upāyāsaḥ sa pariḷāho
